content: One, continue to reduce manufacturing and production costs and maintain our advantage as a low-cost producer; two, streamline and simplify the organizational structure; three, realized cost synergies from acquisitions and recent plant closures; four, focus on revenue management, including more disciplined pricing; and five, accelerate growth through organic market share gains, capture missed revenue opportunities, including improving our ability to align cultivation planning with market demand, reintroduce a focus on medical, and strengthen our commercial capabilities and innovation pipeline.
